showerReviews.reviewText: … are over flowing onto the floor, debris and dirty towels all over the place, sauna floor is disgusting and muddy, and the shower stalls are filthy. I only saw 2 of the far-too-few sanitizing stations on the gym floor having wipes in them. …

… I’ve had more than one bad experience with this gym. Equipment is not clean you can visibly see dirt, sweat ect on machines. Locker room, showers, sauna filthy. Something is always broken. As I was drying off after a shower before work, …
… The men's locker room smells like it should only cleaner. Shower facilities are kept nice and mold free. …

… been dry for nearly two years. Locker room facilities are constantly in some state of disrepair. The locker rooms are so hot that it renders showering useless. By the time you shower, dry off, and get dressed you already have a full on …

… The ventilation in the shower area isn’t enough so the toilets are always wet. The toilet seats are deteriorating which caused a texture. I don’t even want to think about all of the bacteria that is trapping since the seat isn’t smooth and …

The ppl are nice and there's plenty of equipment and stuff.  But if you want to take a shower after your workout, it's not for you. The showers are some of the grossest I've seen. However if you are looking for pounds of wet old hair to …

… Bathrooms smell of sewage, machines constantly don't work. Pool has been out of service since before COVID. Speaking of COVID, the shower stalls weren't cleaned since before COVID, I can recall snot on the wall from before COVID. …

… for the next month or two. The mens locker room is almost always completely trashed, the restrooms have had broken stall doors since I joined over half a year ago, as well as shower doors being broken as well. Often times I find no soap in …

… after use. Last time I was there literally some one took a dump in the shower and the one I was using I noticed fecal matter in that rubber floor mat with the holes .. gym hasn’t fixed that thigh machine in over a year …. What else closes …
